job_title: Technician Shift-Holiday Inn Lampung Bukit Randu
job_description:
Main Responsibility : 
Handle repair requests promptly, including guestroom maintenance, lighting, air conditioning, water systems, and general facilities.
Assist in troubleshooting technical issues and ensuring all equipment functions properly.
Maintain and operate hotel machinery, tools, and engineering equipment safely.
Record daily maintenance activities and report to the Engineering Supervisor/Chief Engineer.
Ensure compliance with safety, fire protection, and energy saving procedures.
Support renovation, installation, and improvement projects within the hotel.
Maintain cleanliness and organization in the engineering workshop and storage areas.

Qualifications:
Male/Female
Experience in engineering, maintenance, or hotel facility operations is an advantage fresh graduates are welcome
Basic knowledge of electrical, mechanical, plumbing, and systems.
Ability to operate tools, machines, and safety equipment properly.
Strong problem solving skills and attention to detail.
Physically fit and able to perform manual maintenance tasks.
Willing to work in shifts and respond to emergencies when needed.
Disciplined, responsible, and able to work independently or in a team.
Understanding of safety standards and maintenance procedures.
